Name: HMS Olympus
Fate: Sunk by mine off Malta, 8 May 1942
Propulsion:
2 shaft diesel electric. 4,250 hp Admiralty diesels
Electric motors: 1,390 hp
Speed:
17.5 knots (32.4 km/h) surfaced
8 knots (15 km/h) submerged
Armament:
8 × 21 in (530 mm) (533 mm) torpedo tubes (6 bow, 2 stern)
1 × 4-inch (102 mm) deck gun
2 × .303 inch AA machine guns
